cast.name: 贾斯娜·弗里茨·鲍尔 Jasna Fritzi Bauer
海蒙·玛丽亚·巴汀格 Haymon Maria Buttinger

introduction: A 24-hours odyssey through the darkness begins - with coffee and cigarettes at mommy Patricia's on the balcony. She wants the best for Carmen without realizing what her daughter really needs. Jakob is Carmen's friend. He takes her to the opera. Le nozze di Figaro. While Figaro comes closer to Susanne, Carmen becomes estranged from Jakob. Jakob can't recognize her suffering either. Carmen is alone with her decision, until someone recognizes her in the darkness.
